subtitleNullable: Original, untouched datasets provided by Shopee
descriptionNullable:
## Context

This dataset is specifically created for all of Shopee Code League 2020 Data Science and Data Analytics competitions (six in total). This competition lasts for two months which required all the teams and participants to come out with data analysis solutions, machine learning models ranging from image classification to natural language processing model.


## Content

This dataset consists of six folders, categorized by the competition itself, each has its training dataset, and test dataset and its respective CSV files which usually are train.csv and test.csv


## Inspiration

These are compiled examples of real-world Data Science and Data Analytics use-cases in the e-commerce industry, grab your chance to explore and learn how to do pre-processing, and build good image prediction models.


## Acknowledgements

I on behalf of the participating teams would like to thank Shopee for hosting this series of great competitions and giving chances for students who are new to Data Science or even have some experience to work with real-world problems, particularly in the E-Commerce industry.


## Sponsors
